Richard Foreman and Kate Manheim Papers
Richard Foreman and Kate Manheim Papers

Black scrapbook. Includes photographs, programs, clippings and other documentation of Richard Foreman's theater involvement at Brown University as well as Amy Taubin's theater performances from the same time.
